name: libap
short_description:
Libap is a simple library aimed with the purpose of providing an easy way for developers to create and mantain audio players. It's the main playback library in fPlayer audio player since version 2.1, developed and mantained by the same group.

It is written in C# and uses (currently) the Windows MCI API and csid3lib for audio playback and ID3 tagging.

This library is designed to provide a fixed API set, with independence of the playback engine used, so while temporarily MCI is used for speed coding motivations -in the future this library will feature more powerful sound playback engines.

This library is distributed under the GNU LGPL.
summary: A simple .NET library for Windows audio playback and ID3 tagging
